1: <error-prone><error-prone>byed dang skrod pa nyid//sde rengs byed dang mngon spyod dang//ji ltar rigs par rnal 'byor ma'i//bskyed dang gnas dang phyed rgyu dang//don byed ye shes rnam shes dang//lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba 'o//</error-prone></error-prone>
